publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2401 Ms Margaret Curran:Water Services etc. (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees that, during Stage 3 of the Water Services etc. (Scotland) Bill, debate on groups of amendments shall, subject to Rule 9.8.4A, be brought to a conclusion by the time-limits indicated (each time-limit being calculated from when the Stage begins and excluding any periods when other business is under consideration or when the meeting of the Parliament is suspended or otherwise not in progress): Groups 1 to 4 – 20 minutes Group 5 – 40 minutes Supported by: Tavish Scott*
